DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal of this research is to develop and test strategies to decrease potentially inappropriate medication use among the elderly.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Patient Education on Benzodiazepine Use in the Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: Specifically, the purpose of the study is to determine whether direct patient education is effective in decreasing benzodiazepine use in seniors.
DOC.criteria: Men and women Full benefit members living in a SASH facility 60 years old or older Using at least 1 active short/medium/long acting benzodiazepine at time of recruitment Inability to provide consent Inability to communicate in English Diagnosis of severe mental illness, dementia, seizure disorder
